description: "An 18th century map of the Netherlands, with an inset map of Southeast Asia highlighting the trade of the Dutch and their colonies. Within the inset is a drawing of the port of Batavia (Jakarta) with sailing ships in the harbour and mountains behind."
title: "Belgii   pars   septentrionalis   communi   nomine   vulgo   Hollandia:   nuncupata   continens   statum   potentissimae   Batavorum   Reipublicae   septimo   seu   Provincias   (Commonly   known   as   Holland,   the   northern   part   of   the   Netherlands,   the   name   of   the   common:   the   seventh   day   to   be   named   or   containing   the   state   of   the   most   powerful   of   all   the   provinces   of   the   Republic   of   the   Batavians)   -   INSET   MAP   OF   NETHERLANDS   BATAVIA"
